alert.note: Alert for Coalinga - Avenal; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 3:23PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Kern, southeastern Kings and southwestern Fresno Counties through 400 PM PDT... At 321 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles east of Avenal, or 28 miles southwest of Hanford, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kettleman City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coalinga - Avenal; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties
